name: Chess game with talkback & voice control
name_original: Chess game with talkback & voice control
description:
GameHands: chess is a free to play online multiplayer chess game with talk back and voice control features. 

  • Play against users from across the globe.
  •  Invite your friends to play. 
  • You can customise the chess board colour & chess pieces 
  • You can play the computer or play other online players from around the world.

Note: Voice control is only compatible with the Google Chrome browser and you will need a Microphone. We actually recommend using a headset.

Additional: Scores not available on this version

Helpful hints:

  • If you wish to change your online name, click the "Disconnect" button. This will allow you to enter a name in the "Online name" field. Finally click the "Play online" button to re-connect online using your new name.
  • To play another online chess player click a name, in black, in the online chess list. and click request game in the pop-up dialog.
